text: The NFL Top 100 Players of 2011 was the first season of the series. It ended with reigning NFL MVP Tom Brady being ranked #1, while Super Bowl MVP Aaron Rodgers was ranked #11. ==Episode list== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Episode No. !! Air date !!
